page.syntax: Table_Name as C = ui_prompt_new_table([C default_name [,L warn ]])

argument.name: Table_Name
argument.description: The name of the new table.

argument.name: default_name
argument.description: The default name to place into the Specify Table Name dialog box.

argument.name: warn
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. .F. = Does not warn you if you will replace an existing table. .T. = Warns you if you will replace an existing table.

page.description: Prompts for the name of a new table.
page.discussion: The UI_PROMPT_NEW_TABLE() function displays the Specify Table Name dialog box, then returns the fully qualified name of the new table. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
